IVAN AARON ESGUERRA

Web Developer

I develop and design functional, creative, details and usability oriented websites as well as web applications by exposing the simplicity and the latest web standards as the main principles.

How I work

Responsive Design for all Devices

Making your website responsive regardless to the device that were used. In which it will able to view in desktop, ablets and phones conceiving an easy and good web pages.

Code Efficiency

Depict a structural code to exhibit a well-presented website. An high-execution-speed evironment where performance and scalability are paramount.

Intuitive User Interface

Interacting a system spontaneously prompted through intuition.

Projects

Coba

The Software Platform is similar to Tynker but targeted on School Institutions to formalize teaching programming to Grade School. The project utilizes latest Web Development technology Angular 5, ReactJS, Node.js, Python and open source Scrath 3.0 Application. The ultimate aim of the platform is to provide a massive online programming education at a low cost.
